title: What is the pay package offered to a fresher by HCL Technologies and what is the growth pattern for the same over the years? - Quora

response.answer_text: Similar to other IT firms like Wipro, TCS, even HCL Tech. has different profiles to hire for. There was a time when these IT firms used to hire freshers, and train them for 3–6 months to get them accustomed to their work style, processes, and culture etc. But, this no longer happnes. Owing to the cut-throat competition, all these IT conglomerates no longer hire freshers even through consultancies. They rather prefer candidates who are well trained and requre minimal assistance. As far as growth is concerned, apart from the profile, companies have also started focusing on the skill-sets of each candidate. No matter if you slog for 12 hours in a day, but if you aren’t being productive, the companies will no longer consider you for higher positions. So, depending on how good your profitability is for the company, they decide your growth pattern aka the annual increment. Hope my answer helps you understand the corporate culture a little better. Be Wise and then RISE. Best regards,Manu Mathur (Admin @ Manu Mathur - Blogger | Content Writer)

It might depend Upon the Profile offered and the mode of recruitment. HCL Technologies offer 3.5 LPA (Tech Analyst) For On Campus Recruitment where as it depends upon You college and Profile as well. HCL offer Around 3.5 LPA to 4.0 LPA For Off Campus drive. Recently My senior got placed at HCL Technologies as Business Analyst via Off Campus Drive and was offered 4LPA for a Fresher position. The growth depend upon You performance and Rating but Considering the Standards you can expect 7 % to 10% Growth everyyear. Hcl is a one of the finest place to learn and grow for a individual hence if you are able to Crack the interview. Do join if you aren't having a better offer. Thanks for A2A
